titles.title: Honoring John E. Warnock, Charles M. Geschke, Forrest M. Bird, Esther Sans Takeuchi, and IBM Corporation for receiving the 2008 National Medal of Technology and Innovation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science and Technology.
Mr. Baird moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 935.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Baird objected to the vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote (2/3 required): 402 - 0 (Roll no. 94).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/9/2010--Passed House without amendment. Recognizes and honors the innovative technological achievements of John E. Warnock, Charles M. Geschke, Forrest M. Bird, Esther Sans Takeuchi, and the IBM Corporation and congratulates them for receiving the 2008 National Medal of Technology and Innovation.
